detail_desc: Block-coloured cardigan in soft sweatshirt fabric with an embroidered motif, ribbed stand-up collar and press-studs down the front. Long raglan sleeves, welt side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sports trousers in a sturdy cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist. Side pockets with a taped zip, flap back pockets and gently tapered legs with elastic detailing at the hems.
Blouse in a patterned weave with a V-neck with a drawstring at the front, long sleeves with a seam and flounce at the cuffs, and a flounced hem.

Dress in airy, crinkled plumeti chiffon with a V-neck and wrapover at the front, elasticated seam at the waist and gently flared skirt with a seam and wide flounce at the hem. Scalloped lace trims at the cuffs and hem. Partly lined in jersey.
Spacious shopper in soft imitation leather with two handles and a magnetic fastener at the top. Narrow, adjustable shoulder strap. Size 12.5x28x29 cm.
Short-sleeved jersey top in a soft viscose blend with a print motif on the front. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a dress and puff pants in a cotton weave. Dress with an opening and buttons at the sides and a seam at the waist with gathers at the front and elastication at the back. Shoulder straps that have decorative knot details at the front and cross at the back where they fasten with concealed buttons. Puff pants with an elasticated waist and elasticated hems. Lined.
Earrings with a round embossed metal disc and pearly pendants. Length 4.5 cm.
V-neck blouse in a crinkled weave with 3/4-length sleeves with flounced cuffs, and a flounce at the hem.
Straight-cut top in airy jersey crêpe with a boat neck and short sleeves with pleated trims.
Dungaree dress in soft cotton corduroy with adjustable shoulder straps, press-studs at the sides and front and back pockets. Lined at the top.
Baby Exclusive. Henley top in organic cotton slub jersey with a button placket and chest pocket with a button.
Short A-line dress in a cotton weave with gathered tiers on the skirt. Square neckline front and back and short puff sleeves with elastication at the shoulders and hems. Unlined.
Dress with a slub cotton jersey bodice and woven skirt. Print motif at the top, short butterfly sleeves, an elasticated seam and bow at the waist and patch front pockets.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, smocked sides and high cut at the back.
Triangle bikini top with scalloped trims and gathered, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Ties at the back and back of the neck.

Short jacket in a cotton weave with a small stand-up collar and zip down the front. Long raglan sleeves with elastication and a frill at the cuffs, and a seam at the hem with a drawstring and frill trim.
Satin top with a V-neck front and back, and lace at the top.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and picot trims.

Blouse in airy, patterned crêpe with a small, rounded collar and ties at the neck. Buttons down the front, a lace frill at the top that continues over the shoulders, long sleeves and buttoned cuffs with a scalloped lace trim. Unlined.

Small shoulder bag in imitation leather with a metal chain shoulder strap and flap with a twist lock metal fastener. Outer compartment in a contrasting pattern and one inner compartment. Lined. Size approx. 4.5x15x20 cm.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh sections and a racer back.
Cardigan in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with dropped shoulders and 3/4-length sleeves. No buttons.
Body in soft viscose jersey with a wrapover V-neck, gently draping at the top and narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Seam under the bust and press-studs at the crotch.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist and discreet pockets in the side seams.
Dress with a soft jersey top, visible zip at the back and short cap sleeves. Seam at the waist with a sewn-on bow and a lined, flared skirt in a patterned weave with a sheen.

Cotton poplin shirt with a button-down collar, open chest pocket and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Sleeveless dress in soft, ribbed, patterned cotton jersey with a seam at the waist and circular skirt with an overlocked hem. Unlined.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying jersey with a V-neck and a tie detail at the hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Shorts in soft cotton jersey with embroidered hearts. Narrow, covered elastication and a decorative, twisted drawstring at the waist, and scalloped hems.
Short-sleeved shirt woven in a cotton blend with a turn-down collar, French front and rounded hem. Slim Fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Boxy-style jumper in a soft wool knit containing some recycled cashmere with a ribbed polo neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short, high-waisted A-line skirt in soft twill with covered elastication at the back of the waist, a pleated front with buttons at one side and a smooth back. Unlined.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Oversized top in a fine-knit viscose blend with a wide, rib-trimmed neckline. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with ribbed trims and a rounded, rib-trimmed hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Slightly longer blouse in an airy weave with a small stand-up collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem. Decorative gathers at the shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.

Outdoor tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a brushed thermal inside and a wide waistband with a drawstring and concealed key pocket. Small front pocket and ribbed hems with a zip. Reflective details.
Leggings in heavy, organic cotton jersey with glittery details and a soft brushed inside. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
Short, sleeveless top in viscose jersey with a deep, rib-trimmed neckline, ribbing around the armholes and an overlocked hem with ties at the front.
Knee-length dress in soft, heavily draping viscose jersey. Opening at the top with ties at the neckline, a gathered yoke at the back and long sleeves. Practical inner top for easier nursing access.

Short, hooded parka in a cotton weave with a drawstring at the top, zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front and long raglan sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Flap side pockets with a concealed press-stud and a concealed drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Cotton poplin cargo trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist, front pockets, flap back pockets and a leg pocket. Legs with a tab and press-stud.
Wide, high-waisted trousers in a patterned weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly and low crotch. Side pockets, fake back pockets, and straight legs with creases.
Print-patterned wellingtons with a loop at the back, fabric linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles.
One-shoulder blouse in a cotton weave with a wide flounce that goes over one shoulder and a narrow strap over the other shoulder. Unlined.
Top in jersey made from a cotton blend containing glittery threads with a round neck and long sleeves with a gathered seam and flounce at the cuffs.
V-neck top in a supersoft, fine-knit viscose blend with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and lace trim at the hem. Gathers in the side seams for best fit over the tummy.
Pyjamas in printed cotton jersey. T-shirt top with a round neckline. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Fabric-covered Alice band with a decorative knot detail.
Long-sleeved top in soft fabric with motifs and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams. Detachable hood, a stand-up collar, zip down the front, kangaroo pockets and inner jersey ribbing with thumbholes at the cuffs. Reflective details. Brushed, thermal inside. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Wide cold shoulder top in Tencel™ lyocell with narrow shoulder straps, elastication at the top and short sleeves with narrow elastication at the ends.
Short, off-the-shoulder top in soft jersey with elastication at the top and short, elasticated puff sleeves.
Baby Exclusive. Leggings in a soft merino wool rib knit with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a rounded, woven collar, an opening with a button at the back of the neck, and narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Trim at the hem in a cotton weave.
High-waisted jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, a zip fly and button, back pockets and skinny legs.
Bikini briefs in organic cotton jersey with a mid waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.

Suit trousers in a stretch cotton and Tencel™ lyocell weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly, side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with creases. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a shimmering metallic finish. Low, elasticated waist and high cut at the back.
Slides with faux fur at the top and a braided jute trim around the soles. Rubber soles. Platform 3 cm.

Track jacket in sturdy jersey with a mesh-lined drawstring hood and a zip down the front. Long raglan sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs and mesh-lined side pockets with a taped zip. Unlined.
Cardigan in sweatshirt fabric with a foldover V-neck collar, buttons down the front, a small imitation leather appliqué at the hem and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Treggings in stretch, denim-look jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Platform sandals in cotton canvas with a braided jute trim and heel ties that wrap around the legs. Thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Platform front approx. 3 cm, heel 12 cm.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved dress in patterned, stretch organic cotton jersey with a stand-up collar, press-studs at the back of the neck, a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Hi-tops in imitation suede with a padded edge, elasticated lacing at the front, loop at the back and fabric detail on the tongue. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.

Knee-length dress in soft, patterned viscose jersey with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the top and 3/4-length sleeves. Narrow, elasticated seam under the bust, detachable tie belt and skirt with a sewn-in wrapover.
Shopper with two handles and a tie fastening with metal pendants. Unlined. Size 12x32x33 cm.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a button placket, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short skirt in washed cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets and a raw-edge hem.
Jacket in washed cotton denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, discreet side pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Straight-cut jersey top with short sleeves that end in flounces.
Long-sleeved, block-patterned top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and side pockets.
Calf-length dress in a woven Tencel™ lyocell blend with a deep V-neck and concealed zip at the back. Narrow cut with open sides, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Lined at the top.

Puffer jacket in woven fabric with a detachable, lined hood, high collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Zipped side pockets and concealed elastication at the cuffs and hem. Recycled polyester lining.
